column1:
Senior Officials Name
(Firstname and Surname of PermSecs or SCS2/3 Official, exclude titles, honorifics or post nominals e.g. Sir, Captain, MBE, PhD)
column2:
Start date of trip
(Use the date format: 
YYYY-MM-DD i.e. 2017-11-01)
column4:
Destination
(Include trip destination for both domestic and international journeys, e.g. Manchester, UK or Brussels, Belgium)
column5:
Purpose of trip
(State a clear purpose, e.g. site visit to locally based staff; Senior Leadership meeting; please avoid abbreviations or acronyms)
column6:
Mode of transport
(State if either Rail, Car, Air, Sea, Taxi)
column7:
Class of travel
(i.e. Standard, Economy, Business, First or other)
column8:
Accommodation/Meals (£)
(Please include any associated costs relating to accommodation or meals)
column9:
Other (including hospitality given)
(State Nil Return if none received)
column10:
Total cost, including all visas, accommodation, travel, meals etc. (£)
(This amount should reflect the total cost of the trip, including all visas, additional travel meals etc.)
column11: Total Cost of Use of Official Secure Car (state cost except where officials are accompanying a Minister or Nil Return when not used)
